channel.title: How do you add stuff to the tabs in the emote section?
channel.description: In the emote section there are usually tabs like bank and pk area and training area and shops. Well how do you change/add tabs?

item.title: How do you add stuff to the tabs in the emote section?
item.dc:creator: @barkingdogc barkingdogc
item.description:
@barkingdogc wrote:

click on the tab you whant to change say it the dance emote then check run.server to see what case it it then go to client java and search for that case and there you go add the stuff you need

Read full topic
item.source: How do you add stuff to the tabs in the emote section?
